channel.title: [PI] Pk Base. [PI]
channel.description:
What is a good source i can use to code but not put TOO much work in and use to make a pking server?
Things i want it to have featured.
- All mini-games working. - Summoning. - Dung - All dupes patched. - Good pk system. - Stability should be enough for at-least 50-100 players.
The rest i could really do myself, i'm not trying to learn how to code. I've been coding for 3-4 years so please don't give me a source and say "You could use this, it's for beginners.".
Thank you so much if you comment with a answer. Any answer is helpful, thank you for reading.
- All Time Low

item.title: [PI] Pk Base. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

- All dupes patched.

what? you won’t find one.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pk Base. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Your literally asking us to give you a rsps that is ready to be hosted. Just get a “stable” base and add w/e you want.

Read full topic
